Key Match Events: The Los Angeles Dodgers lead the series 3-1, having outscored the New York Mets 18-2 over the last two games.
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers are -134 moneyline favorites and the total is set at 7.5 runs.
The Yankees carry -118 moneyline odds tonight, while the total is set at 7.5 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The promotion will end at 2:00 AM ET on October 19, 2024.
